segments.text: You have worked in your present company for five years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you want to resign ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As you know I serve as a secretary in my present company , I really want to look for a more challenging opportunity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of work are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just as you advertised in the newspaper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you are interested in our company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what's more , your company is one of the largest and best trading companies in this line of business .
segments.speaker: S2
